description: Parallelization of LTR_FINDER enabling rapid identification of long terminal repeat retrotransposons | A parallel wrapper for LTR_FINDER | ~ ~ ~ Run LTR_FINDER in parallel ~ ~ ~ | This is a Perl wrapper for LTR_FINEDR.
